00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _map{
00015         t_object                ob;     
00016         void                    *obex;
00017         void                    *outlet;
00018         t_symbol                *attr_function;
00019         double                  attr_inputMin;
00020         double                  attr_inputMax;
00021         double                  attr_outputMin;
00022         double                  attr_outputMax;
00023         double                  a, b;                           // Coefficients used for normalizing input
00024         double                  c, d;                           // Coefficients used for scaling normalized output
00025         FunctionLib             *function;
00026 } t_map;
00027 
00028 
00029 // Prototypes for methods
00030 void*           map_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00031 void            map_free(t_map *obj);
00032 void            map_assist(t_map *obj, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00033 void            map_int(t_map *obj, long x);
00034 void            map_float(t_map *obj, double x);
00035 void            map_getFunctions(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00036 void            map_getParameter(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00037 void            map_getFunctionParameters(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00038 void            map_setParameter(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00039 t_max_err       map_setFunction(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00040 t_max_err       map_setInputMin(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00041 t_max_err       map_setInputMax(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);

00043 t_max_err       map_setOutputMin(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00044 t_max_err       map_setOutputMax(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00045 void            map_scaleOutput(t_map *obj);

00052 /************************************************************************************/
00053 // Main() Function
00054 
00055 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00056 {
00057         t_class *c;
00058         
00059         jamoma_init();
00060 
00061         // Define our class
00062         c = class_new("jcom.map",(method)map_new, (method)map_free, (short)sizeof(t_map), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00063         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_map, obex));
00064 
00065         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00066         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_int,                                     "int", A_GIMME, 0L);
00067         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_float,                           "float", A_GIMME, 0L);
00068         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_getFunctions,            "functions.get", A_GIMME, 0);
00069         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_getParameter,            "parameter.get", A_GIMME, 0);
00070         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_getFunctionParameters, "function.parameters.get", A_GIMME, 0);
00071         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_setParameter,            "parameter", A_GIMME, 0);
00072         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_assist,                          "assist", A_CANT, 0L); 
00073     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout", A_CANT,0);  
00074     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref", A_CANT, 0);
00075 
00076         // ATTRIBUTE: set the function to use
00077         class_addattr(c, 
00078                 attr_offset_new("function", _sym_symbol, 0,
00079                 (method)0, (method)map_setFunction, calcoffset(t_map, attr_function)));
00080         // ATTRIBUTE: set the input minimum value
00081         class_addattr(c,
00082                 attr_offset_new("inputMin", _sym_float64, 0,
00083                 (method)0, (method)map_setInputMin, calcoffset(t_map, attr_inputMin)));
00084         // ATTRIBUTE: set the input maximum value
00085         class_addattr(c,
00086                 attr_offset_new("inputMax", _sym_float64, 0,
00087                 (method)0, (method)map_setInputMax, calcoffset(t_map, attr_inputMax))); 
00088                 
00089         // ATTRIBUTE: set the output minimum value
00090         class_addattr(c,
00091                 attr_offset_new("outputMin", _sym_float64, 0,
00092                 (method)0, (method)map_setOutputMin, calcoffset(t_map, attr_outputMin)));
00093         // ATTRIBUTE: set the output maximum value
00094         class_addattr(c,
00095                 attr_offset_new("outputMax", _sym_float64, 0,
00096                 (method)0, (method)map_setOutputMax, calcoffset(t_map, attr_outputMax)));
00097 
00098         // Finalize our class
00099         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00100         map_class = c;
00101         return 0;
00102 }

00105 /************************************************************************************/
00106 // Object Life
00107 
00108 void *map_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00109 {
00110         t_map *obj;                                                                     // Declare an object (based on our struct)
00111 
00112         obj = (t_map *)object_alloc(map_class);         // Create object, store pointer to it (get 1 inlet free)
00113         if(obj){
00114                 object_obex_store((void *)obj, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(obj,NULL));
00115             obj->outlet = outlet_new(obj, 0);
00116                 obj->attr_function = _sym_nothing;
00117                 obj->attr_inputMin = 0;
00118                 obj->attr_inputMax = 1;
00119                 obj->attr_outputMin = 0;
00120                 obj->attr_outputMax = 1;
00121                 obj->function = NULL;
00122                 attr_args_process(obj, argc, argv);
00123                 map_scaleInput(obj);
00124                 map_scaleOutput(obj);
00125                 if(!obj->function)
00126                         object_attr_setsym(obj, gensym("function"), gensym("linear"));
00127         }
00128         return obj;                                                                             // Return pointer to our instance
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 void map_free(t_map *obj)
00133 {
00134         if(obj->function)
00135                 delete obj->function;
00136 }

00139 /************************************************************************************/
00140 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00141 
00142 // Method for Assistance Messages
00143 void map_assist(t_map *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00144 {
00145         if(msg==1)                                                      // Inlets
00146                 strcpy(dst, "x");
00147         else if(msg==2){                                        // Outlets
00148                 switch(arg){
00149                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "y=f(x)"); break;
00150                         default: strcpy(dst, "dumpout"); break;
00151                 }
00152         }
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 void map_int(t_map *obj, long x)
00157 {
00158         map_float(obj, (double)x);
00159 }
00160 
00161 
00162 void map_float(t_map *obj, double x)
00163 {
00164         double y;
00165         
00166         y = obj->c*obj->function->mapValue(obj->a*x + obj->b) + obj->d;
00167         outlet_float(obj->outlet, y);
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 void map_getFunctions(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00172 {
00173         t_atom          a[2];
00174         t_symbol        **functionNames = NULL;
00175         long            numFunctions = 0;
00176         long            i;
00177         
00178         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00179         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("functions"), 1, a);
00180         
00181         jamoma_getFunctionList(&numFunctions, &functionNames);
00182         
00183         for(i=0; i<numFunctions; i++){
00184                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00185                 atom_setsym(a+1, functionNames[i]);
00186                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("functions"), 2, a);
00187         }
00188         
00189         if(numFunctions)
00190                 sysmem_freeptr(functionNames);
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 void map_getParameter(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00195 {
00196         t_symbol        *parameterName;
00197         t_atom          *a;
00198         long            ac = 0;
00199         t_atom          *av = NULL;
00200         
00201         if(!argc){
00202                 error("jcom.map: not enough arguments to parameter.get");
00203                 return;
00204         }
00205         
00206         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv);
00207         obj->function->getParameter(parameterName, &ac, &av);
00208         if(ac) {
00209                 //atom_setsym(a+0, parameterName);
00210                 //atom_setfloat(a+1, av);
00211                 a = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom)*(ac+1));
00212                 // Forst list item is name of parameter
00213                 atom_setsym(a, parameterName);
00214                 // Next the whole shebang is copied
00215                 sysmem_copyptr(a+1, av, sizeof(t_atom)*ac);
00216                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("current.parameter"), ac+1, a);
00217                 //object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("getParameter"), ac, av);
00218                 //object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("getParameter"), ac+1, a);
00219         
00220                 // The pointer to an atom assign in the getParameter method needs to be freed.
00221                 sysmem_freeptr(av);
00222                 sysmem_freeptr(a);
00223         }
00224 }
00225 
00226 void map_getFunctionParameters(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00227 {
00228         t_atom          a[2];
00229         long n; t_atom *av;
00230         obj->function->getFunctionParameters(&n, &av);
00231         if(n) {
00232                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00233                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("function.parameters"), 1, a);
00234                         for(int i=0; i<n; i++){
00235                                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00236                                 atom_setsym(a+1, atom_getsym(av+i));
00237                                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("function.parameters"), 2, a);
00238                 }
00239                 sysmem_freeptr(av);
00240         } else {
00241                 // no parameters
00242                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("function.parameters.get"), 0, 0);
00243         }
00244                 
00245 }

00249 
00250 void map_setParameter(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00251 {
00252         //double                value = 0.0;
00253         t_symbol        *parameterName;
00254         
00255         if(argc < 2){
00256                 error("jcom.map: not enough arguments to setParameter");
00257                 return;
00258         }
00259         
00260         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv);
00261         obj->function->setParameter(parameterName, argc-1, argv+1);
00262 }

00265 // ATTRIBUTE: set rampunit
00266 t_max_err map_setFunction(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00267 {
00268         obj->attr_function = atom_getsym(argv);
00269         jamoma_getFunction(obj->attr_function, &obj->function);
00270         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00271 }

00274 // ATTRIBUTE: Set input minimum
00275 t_max_err map_setInputMin(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00276 {
00277         obj->attr_inputMin = atom_getfloat(argv);
00278         map_scaleInput(obj);
00279         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00280 
00281 }
00282 
00283 
00284 // ATTRIBUTE: Set input maximum
00285 t_max_err map_setInputMax(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00286 {
00287         obj->attr_inputMax = atom_getfloat(argv);
00288         map_scaleInput(obj);
00289         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00290 }
00291 
00292 
00293 // Recalculate values to use for scaling of input values
00294 void map_scaleInput(t_map *obj)
00295 {
00296         // Prevent dividing by 0
00297         if (obj->attr_inputMin == obj->attr_inputMax)
00298                 {
00299                         obj->a = 1;
00300                         post("jcom.map: Same value used for input min and max.");
00301                 }
00302         else
00303                 obj->a = 1./(obj->attr_inputMax - obj->attr_inputMin);
00304         obj->b = -1 * obj->a * obj->attr_inputMin;
00305 }
00306 
00307 
00308 // ATTRIBUTE: Set output minimum
00309 t_max_err map_setOutputMin(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00310 {
00311         obj->attr_outputMin = atom_getfloat(argv);
00312         map_scaleOutput(obj);
00313         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00314 
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00318 // ATTRIBUTE: Set output maximum
00319 t_max_err map_setOutputMax(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00320 {
00321         obj->attr_outputMax = atom_getfloat(argv);
00322         map_scaleOutput(obj);
00323         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00324 }
00325 
00326 
00327 // Recalculate values to use for scaling of output values
00328 void map_scaleOutput(t_map *obj)
00329 {
00330         obj->c = obj->attr_outputMax - obj->attr_outputMin;
00331         obj->d = obj->attr_outputMin;
00332 }
